Messaging Specialist

2023 - Present

Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (CIBC)

  • Mail-Flow Rerouting: Designed and implemented criteria-based routing for 70,000+ users, transitioning from centralized mail transport.
  • Sensitive Email Purging: Automated purging of sensitive emails using Purview retention labels and sensitive info types for 14,000+ users.

  • Data Resiliency: Implemented air-gapped, immutable backups for Exchange, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams for cyber-attack recovery.
  • Business Continuity: Deployed ProofPoint Continuity to maintain uninterrupted email communications during prolonged outages.
  • PowerShell Automation: Developing and maintaining scripts for bulk operations, reporting, and lifecycle management across M365 workloads.
